actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide for phased-in payment of Social Security Disability Insurance payments during the waiting period for individuals with a terminal illness.
short_title: Expedited Disability Insurance Payments for Terminally Ill Individuals Act of 2013

summary.text: Expedited Disability Insurance Payments for Terminally Ill Individuals Act of 2013 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to prescribe formulae for payment of Social Security Disability Insurance (SSDI) benefits over a period of 24 consecutive calendar months for individuals determined to be under a disability upon submission of a diagnosis of a terminal illness.

titles.title: Expedited Disability Insurance Payments for Terminally Ill Individuals Act of 2013
A bill to provide for phased-in payment of Social Security Disability Insurance payments during the waiting period for individuals with a terminal illness.
